name: M Squared Web Services
body:
#Welcome to M Squared Web![](http://www.markmcfadden.net/images/m2web.png)
M Squared Web Services is an application development company based in the Erlanger, Kentucky area that can provide professional web based solutions to small and medium sized businesses.

Utilizing various platforms and the latest in multimedia applications, M Squared Web Services offers state of the art web design and application development that can:
* provide a secure online channel for electronic commerce
* enhance your existing retail and wholesale channels
* increase your customer base via a convenient and timely manner
* assist in the aggregation and maintenance of your data through web based solutions

***
## What We Do.
### Web Site and Application Development
* M Squared Web Services develops with standard-compliant coding to provide web sites and applications with animated graphics, dynamic interactivity, and custom functionality.
* M Squared can create small, medium, and large web sites and applications. 
* No job is too small.

### Custom Solutions
* We can provide custom website and application development solutions.
* Enhance existing customer channels while building new income streams. 
* Secure online retail and wholesale transactions. 
* Maintain and manage your online customer contacts and sales over the web.

***
## What We Think - [Mark's Musings](http://msquaredwebsvc.blogspot.com/)
